title: News24.com | Water crisis could sabotage Zimbabwe's coronavirus lockdown
description: The water-short southern African country is starting to enforce a 21-day lockdown to try contain the spread of the deadly coronavirus.
content:
Buckets and jerrycans in hand or in wheelbarrows, dozens of Zimbabweans stand close to each other in a long queue, patiently waiting at a borehole in Harare's middle-class Mabelreign suburb to collect water.
While this is a daily sight, this week things are … [+3510 chars]
